name: Live Wallpaper Master
description: The program gives access to a large collection of animated wallpapers. In addition, the powerful built-in editor enables you to create your own wallpapers.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7 Processor: 2.6 GHz Pentium IV or equivalent AMD Athlon processor Memory: 1 MB RAM Graphics: HD Graphics 4000 or above DirectX: Version 8.1 Storage: 60 MB available space
